metadata.title: CVE-2013-5645 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Roundcube webmailbefore 0.9.3 allow user-assisted remote attackers to inject arbitrary webscript or HTML via the body of a message visited in (1) new or (2) draftmode, related to compose.inc; and (3) might allow remote authenticatedusers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via an HTML signature, relatedto save_identity.inc.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-5645` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 0.9.5-2
roundcube-core - 0.9.5-2
roundcube-mysql - 0.9.5-2
roundcube-pgsql - 0.9.5-2
roundcube-plugins - 0.9.5-2
roundcube-sqlite3 - 0.9.5-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: roundcube package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.5-2').
